tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FaceRecognitionData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    camera_id INT,
    image_url VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    recognition_result JSON
);
CREATE TABLE CameraData ( camera_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, image_data BYTEA NOT NULL, location TEXT NOT NULL )
CREATE TABLE UserData ( user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, first_name TEXT NOT NULL, last_name TEXT NOT NULL, email TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL )
CREATE TABLE RecognitionData ( recognition_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, user_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES UserData(user_id), timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, confidence FLOAT NOT NULL )
CREATE TABLE AlertData ( alert_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, camera_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES CameraData(camera_id), timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, alert_type TEXT NOT NULL )

CREATE TABLE AccessData ( access_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, user_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES UserData(user_id), camera_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES CameraData(camera_id), access_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL )
